thread.title: Political party membership numbers since general election
thread.title_full: Political party membership numbers since general election - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Political party membership numbers since general election
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Political party membership numbers since general election 19 October 2015 Last updated at 14:49 BST
Some political parties have seen huge jumps in the size of their membership since the general election.
But as Jo Coburn reports, the figures still look quite small when compared to the numbers enjoyed by parties 50 years ago.
Watch more Daily and Sunday Politics clips
